reviewText: My children ages 4 and 6 enjoy this film.  I'd also recommend "Bob the Builder A Christmas to Remember."  That was the first Bob film we purchased and I can't tell you how many times we've played it.  Elton John is in it and it's a hoot.  I have found that that films with Neil Morrissey as the voice of Bob are more enjoyable to my children than the ones with some other person doing Bob's voice.
Title: Bob the Builder - Bob's White Christmas VHS

reviewText: We purchased this for Christmas and it has been played over and over. This DVD  plays just as wonderful as it did when it was new.
Title: Bob the Builder - Bob's White Christmas VHS

reviewText: My son is a Bob fan but for some reason he's just not into this movie.  I haven't really watched it to try and figure out why, I just figure that even at 3 years old my son knows what he likes and doesn't like.
Title: Bob the Builder - Bob's White Christmas VHS

reviewText: Dinosaur Bones, an Amusement Park, and Bob the Builder and friends - what's not to love!  My boys have this DVD on repeat now in the car and they love it.  It is a fun, bright, and great new Bob the Builder DVD, even better its an hour long so its just the right length.  The gang works together and it really is a wholesome kids show.  It is also perfect for summertime when you are taking kids to an amusement park!
summary: Very cute and Great for Summertime!
Title: Bob the Builder - Bob's White Christmas VHS

reviewText: My son loves Bob the Builder! It's such a cute and educational show. My son can tell you every construction vehicle there is!
Title: Bob the Builder - Bob's White Christmas VHS

reviewText: My three year old enjoyed watching this show leading up to Christmas.  He is a big Bob the builder fan
Title: Bob the Builder - Bob's White Christmas VHS

reviewText: My grandson loves to watch this on his Kindle.  He loves anything with Bob The Builder.  Thanks so much for offering this to us.
Title: Bob the Builder - Bob's White Christmas VHS

reviewText: My kids love it, this is a good movie and so cute too it is funny they love it. Thanks & have a good day!
summary: Bob the Builder: The Big Dino Dig Movie
Title: Bob the Builder - Bob's White Christmas VHS

reviewText: My grand son is 4 years old and love Bob the builder but is favorite is the one about the big Dino. He can see it again and again and have fun.
Title: Bob the Builder - Bob's White Christmas VHS

reviewText: He watched it several times over the course of the weekend.  I am planning to purchase it before too long. Good clean, optimistic, can-do fun!
Title: Bob the Builder - Bob's White Christmas VHS

reviewText: My 2 year old son has all the Bob movies, and we got this one for him just before Christmas. Its good, but not as good at the three that came before this one. It seems a little bit of a knock off, as not all the segments have anything to do with Christmas, but my son loves it, so we watch it, and watch it, and watch it...
summary: Not as good as the few before...
Title: Bob the Builder - Bob's White Christmas VHS
